# kup-dash



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                              | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `active`   | `active`    | Sets whether the component is clickable or not.          | `boolean` | `false` |
| `fontSize` | `font-size` | Select the layout of the component. 8 layouts available. | `string`  | `''`    |
| `layout`   | `layout`    | Set the font size of the component.                      | `string`  | `'1'`   |


## Events

| Event          | Description | Type              |
| -------------- | ----------- | ----------------- |
| `kupDashClick` |             | `CustomEvent<{}>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                                  | Description                             |
| ----------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| `--dash_background-color, --kup-text-input_font-size` | Set height of the font and the svg icon |
